> On Nov 30, 2006, at 3:39 AM, j_cumps wrote:
>
> Eric,
>
> This works for me, using Ant 1.7 RC1, and JUnit 4.1 or 4.2.
>     ....
>
> I added <formatter type="brief" usefile="false"/> to show the
> testresults.

	Thanks! The formatter turned out to be the key for me, as jUnit
then told me my test class wasn't found. Added the proper classpath
definition and I'm in business.
